claim: Flublok ensures identical antigenic match with WHO- and FDA-selected flu strains.

extracted_evidence.quote: The antigens used in the as says were baculo virus eri ved rHAs representing the A/Solomon Islands 03 2006 (H1 N1), /Wisconsin 67 2005 (H3 N2), and B/Malaysia/2506/2004 viruses, rovided by Protein Sciences Corporation.
extracted_evidence.relevance_explanation: This quote shows that the antigens in Flublok were derived from the same specific strains selected for the vaccine, which are the WHO- and FDA-selected strains for that season, supporting the claim of identical antigenic match.
